check_functions.name: postgresql_database_server_enforce_ssl_enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if SSL is enforced on PostgreSQL database server.

check_functions.name: postgresql_database_server_log_checkpoints_on
check_functions.description: Checks if log checkpoints are enabled on PostgreSQL database server.

check_functions.name: postgresql_database_server_log_connections_on
check_functions.description: Checks if log connections are enabled on PostgreSQL database server.

check_functions.name: postgresql_database_server_log_disconnections_on
check_functions.description: Checks if log disconnections are enabled on PostgreSQL database server.

check_functions.name: postgresql_database_server_connection_throttling_on
check_functions.description: Checks if connection throttling is enabled on PostgreSQL database server.

check_functions.name: postgresql_database_server_log_retention_days_greater_than_three
check_functions.description: Checks if log retention days are greater than three on PostgreSQL database server.

check_functions.name: postgresql_database_server_disallow_azure_services_access
check_functions.description: Checks if access from Azure services is disallowed on PostgreSQL database server.

check_functions.name: postgresql_database_server_enable_infrastructure_double_encryption
check_functions.description: Checks if infrastructure double encryption is enabled on PostgreSQL database server.
